title: Delete Merged Branches
description: When working on a project with Git, it's common to create and merge branches. However, over time, these branches can accumulate and clutter your local repository. Deleting merged branches is a good practice to keep your repository clean and organized.

meta.title: Delete Merged Branches: A Git Playground Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to delete local branches that have been merged into the master branch in a Git repository.
meta.keywords: branch management, repository cleanup, git labs, programming tutorial, git, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful deletion
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 删除已合并的分支
i18n.description: 使用Git处理项目时，创建和合并分支很常见。然而，随着时间的推移，这些分支可能会累积并使本地仓库变得杂乱。删除已合并的分支是保持仓库整洁有序的良好做法。

meta.title: 删除已合并的分支：Git实验挑战
meta.description: 学习如何在Git仓库中删除已合并到主分支的本地分支。
meta.keywords: 分支管理, 仓库清理, Git实验室, 编程教程, Git, Git实验

verify.name: 验证删除是否成功
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
